org.sensorhub.impl.persistence

Class GenericStreamStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.impl.module.AbstractModule<StreamStorageConfig>
      • org.sensorhub.impl.persistence.GenericStreamStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventListener, IEventProducer, IModule<StreamStorageConfig>, IBasicStorage, IObsStorage, IRecordStorageModule<StreamStorageConfig>, IStorageModule<StreamStorageConfig>

    public class GenericStreamStorage
extends AbstractModule<StreamStorageConfig>
implements IRecordStorageModule<StreamStorageConfig>, IObsStorage, IEventListener

    Generic wrapper/adapter enabling any storage implementation to store data coming from data events (e.g. sensor data, processed data, etc.)
    This class takes care of registering with the appropriate producers and uses the storage API to store records in the underlying storage.

    Since:
    Feb 21, 2015
    Author:
    Alex Robin

      Computes the (potentially approximate) number of records matching the given filter.
      Since the returned value can be approximate and the number of matching records can change before or even during the actual call to IBasicStorage.getRecordIterator(IDataFilter), the exact number of records can only be obtained by counting the records returned by the iterator next() function.

      • getNumMatchingRecords

        public int getNumMatchingRecords(IDataFilter filter,
                        long maxCount)
        Description copied from interface: IBasicStorage
        Computes the (potentially approximate) number of records matching the given filter.
        Since the returned value can be approximate and the number of matching records can change before or even during the actual call to IBasicStorage.getRecordIterator(IDataFilter), the exact number of records can only be obtained by counting the records returned by the iterator next() function.
        Specified by:
        getNumMatchingRecords in interface IBasicStorage
        Parameters:
        filter - filtering parameters
        maxCount - counting will stop once this threshold is reached
        Returns:
        number of matching records

      • getRecordsTimeRange

        public double[] getRecordsTimeRange(String recordType)
        Description copied from interface: IBasicStorage
        Retrieves time range spanned by all records of the specified type
        Specified by:
        getRecordsTimeRange in interface IBasicStorage
        Parameters:
        recordType - name of record type
        Returns:
        array of length 2 in the form [minTime maxTime] or [NaN NaN] if no records of this type are available

      • getRecordsTimeClusters

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
